item.title: 消息称苹果正在收购视觉 AI 创企
item.guid: 消息称苹果正在收购视觉-AI-创企
item.description:
According to a recent CNBC report, Apple is in late-stage negotiations to acquire a computer vision startup called "Prompt AI." 据 CNBC 日前报道，苹果正在收购一家名为「Prompt AI」的计算机视觉初创公司，目前处于后期谈判状态。

The report states that Apple plans to acquire Prompt AI's engineering talent and the company's technology. It is understood that Prompt's senior management announced the transaction at an all-hands meeting this week, also stating that employees who do not join Apple will receive lower salaries and encouraging them to apply for vacant positions within the company. 报道称， 苹果计划收购 Prompt AI 的工程人才资源和该公司的技术。 据悉，Prompt 高层于本周的全员会议中公布了上述交易，同时表示最后没有加入苹果的员工将会获得较低薪资，并鼓励他们申请公司空缺的职位。

Additionally, Prompt's senior management also stated that potential buyers, including Elon Musk's xAI and his brain-computer interface company Neuralink, had expressed interest in contacting Prompt. 另外，Prompt 高层还表示，马斯克旗下的 xAI 和其脑机公司 Neuralink 在内的潜在买家，也提出了向 Prompt 接触的意愿。

Prompt was founded in 2023 and secured $5 million in seed funding that year, led by AIX and Abstract Ventures. Co-founder and CEO Tete Xiao holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley, and is also the founder of the Berkeley Artificial Intelligence Research (BAIR) Lab. 据悉，Prompt 成立于 2023 年，并在当年获得了由 AIX 和 Abstract Ventures 领投的 500 万美元种子轮融资。联合创始人及 CEO Tete Xiao 为加州大学伯克利分校计算机科学博士，同时也是伯克利人工智能研究（BAIR）实验室的创始人。

According to the introduction, Prompt has a flagship application called "Seemour," which can connect to home security cameras and monitor people, dogs, cats, or other living beings and objects in the home that need attention, sending alerts about unusual activities and based on scene descriptions. 据介绍，Prompt 旗下拥有一个名为「Seemour」的旗舰应用，能够连接家庭式安全摄像头，并通过摄像头对家中需要关照的人、小狗小猫或其他生命、物体进行看管，并能够发送关于异常活动的警报和基于场景描述。

Regarding the aforementioned acquisition, media outlet "The Information" also offered its perspective. It believes that this deal continues Apple's tradition of absorbing small technology companies, primarily for talent rather than acquiring large corporations. 针对上述收购，媒体《The Information》也给出了看法。 其认为这笔交易延续了苹果吸收小型技术公司的传统，主要是为了人才，而不是收购大型公司。

"The Information" previously reported that Apple is generally cautious about large acquisitions because integrating large teams into Apple's unique corporate culture can be quite complex. 《The Information》此前层报道，由于将大型团队融入苹果独特的公司文化会较为复杂，因此苹果通常对大型收购持谨慎态度。

item.title: 中国联通开启 eSIM 业务预约，人数破 3.9 万
item.guid: 中国联通开启-eSIM-业务预约，人数破-3.9-万
item.description:
According to a report by C114 Communication Network on October 10, China Unicom recently officially opened its eSIM service reservation channel, with online reservations exceeding 39,000 people. 据 C114 通信网 10 月 10 日报道， 中国联通近期正式开启 eSIM 业务预约通道，线上预约人数已超 3.9 万人。

According to China Unicom's official introduction, both the APP and self-operated business halls support eSIM services. For details, please consult your local China Unicom or the 10010 customer service hotline. 据中国联通官方介绍，APP 和自有营业厅均支持办理 eSIM 业务，具体需详询当地联通或 10010 客服热线。

Previously, China Mobile officially launched its eSIM reservation interface on September 21st. Just 4 hours after its launch, the system showed that the number of people in the reservation queue exceeded 150,000. 此前， 中国移动已于 9 月 21 日正式上线 eSIM 预约界面，上线仅 4 小时，系统即显示预约排队人数超过 15 万。

In contrast, China Mobile provides more detailed explanations of its business rules, including that the total number of eSIM + physical SIM numbers processed with the same ID card must not exceed 5, a single eSIM phone can activate a maximum of 2 domestic operator numbers, and the number of monthly card replacements for a single number is limited to 5 times. 相较之下，中国移动在业务规则说明方面更为详尽，包括同一身份证办理的 eSIM+实体 SIM 号码总数不得超过 5 个、单台 eSIM 手机最多激活 2 个国内运营商号码、单个号码每月补换卡次数限制为 5 次等。

It is worth noting that China Mobile also stated that during the commercial trial period for eSIM services, applications are only supported through offline self-operated business halls. Users need to go to a business hall for appointment registration, and entrusted agency, online applications, and applications from overseas users are not currently supported. 值得注意的是，中国移动还表示，eSIM 业务商用试验期间仅支持通过线下自由营业厅办理，用户需到营业厅进行预约登记，暂不支持委托代办、线上办理及境外用户申请。

In September this year, Apple officially released the new ultra-thin model iPhone Air, which features a new eSIM design without a physical SIM card slot, and therefore could not be launched for sale immediately. 今年 9 月，苹果正式发布全新超薄机型 iPhone Air，其采用了全新的 eSIM 设计，没有实体 SIM 卡槽，因此未能第一时间启动发售。

At that time, iFanr also immediately confirmed with Apple officials, who stated that they are working closely with regulatory authorities and will launch the iPhone Air for sale as soon as approval is granted. 当时爱范儿也在第一时间与苹果官方确认，苹果官方表示，正与监管机构紧密合作，并将在获批后第一时间启动 iPhone Air 发售。

item.title: OpenAI 年度账单出炉，共计 70 亿美元
item.guid: OpenAI-年度账单出炉，共计-70-亿美元
item.description:
On October 10th, the institution EPOCH AI released its latest data report, revealing OpenAI's astronomical annual bill "burned" in 2024. 10 月 10 日，机构 EPOCH AI 发布最新数据报告，显示了 OpenAI 在 2024 年「烧掉」的天价年度账单。

The released data shows that OpenAI spent a total of approximately US$7 billion (approximately RMB 49.947 billion) in 2024 on leasing cloud computing power from Microsoft. Specifically: 公布的数据显示， OpenAI 在 2024 年共计花费约 70 亿美元（约合人民币 499.47 亿元） ，用于向微软租赁云计算算力。具体来看：

  • Approximately US$5 billion was used for R&D computing resources, of which US$4.5 billion was for behind-the-scenes research and various experimental runs; only US$400 million was for the final training of GPT-4.5; and US$80 million was used to train other models; 约 50 亿美元用于研发算力资源，其中 45 亿美元用于幕后研究和各种实验性运行；而仅有 4 亿美元用于 GPT-4.5 的最终训练；以及 8000 万美元用来训练其他模型；
  • Approximately US$2 billion was used for customer-facing inference computing power. 约 20 亿美元用于面向客户的推理算力。

Analysts stated that based on their calculations and cost estimates for models released by OpenAI from Q2 2024 to Q1 2025, most of OpenAI's R&D computing in 2024 was likely allocated to research, experimental training runs, or training runs for unreleased models, rather than the final primary training of released models such as GPT-4.5, GPT-4o, and o3. 机构人员分析表示，其根据对 OpenAI 从 2024 年第二季度到 2025 年第一季度发布的模型的计算和成本估计，OpenAI 在 2024 年的研发计算中， 大部分可能分配给了研究、实验训练运行或未发布模型的训练运行，而不是发布模型如 GPT-4.5、GPT-4o 和 o3 的最终主要训练。

It is worth mentioning that, according to a recent report by the Financial Times, OpenAI signed a US$1 trillion computing power cooperation agreement this year, to be used for running its AI models. 值得一提的是，据金融时报日前报道，OpenAI 今年签署了达 1 万亿美元的算力合作协议，并用于运行其人工智能模型。

Currently, NVIDIA, AMD, Oracle, and CoreWeave have already established computing power cooperation with OpenAI. These collaborations will provide OpenAI with over 20 gigawatts of computing power over the next decade, equivalent to the electricity produced by 20 nuclear reactors. 目前，已与 OpenAI 达成算力合作的已有英伟达、AMD、甲骨文、CoreWeave。而这些合作将会为 OpenAI 在未来十年内，提供超过 20 吉瓦的计算算力，电力将抵 20 个核反应堆所产。

The report states that, according to OpenAI executives' estimates, deploying 1 gigawatt of AI computing power would cost approximately US$500 billion at current prices, bringing the total cost mentioned above to about US$1 trillion. 报道称，据 OpenAI 高管估计，在当下价格下，部署 1 吉瓦的 AI 计算能力大约需要 5000 亿美元，而上述的总成本约为 1 万亿美元。

Meanwhile, a recent Reuters report indicates that OpenAI's current valuation has reached US$500 billion. According to previous reports by "The Information," OpenAI generated approximately US$4.3 billion in revenue in the first half of 2025, an increase of about 16% compared to the entire previous year. 而路透社最新报道显示，OpenAI 目前估值已经达到 5000 亿美元。据《The Information》此前报道，OpenAI 在 2025 年上半年创造了约 43 亿美元的收入，比去年全年增长了约 16%。

item.title: 比亚迪回应「宋 PLUS 即将停产」：正常产品切换
item.guid: 比亚迪回应「宋-PLUS-即将停产」：正常产品切换
item.description:
According to a recent report by 21st Century Business Herald, in response to market rumors that "Song PLUS is about to be discontinued," a BYD insider responded through the report: "Sea Lion 06 is the replacement model for Song PLUS, and (discontinuing Song PLUS) is a normal product transition." 据 21 财经日前报道，针对「宋 PLUS 即将停产」的市场传闻，比亚迪相关人士通过报道回应： 「海狮 06 就是宋 PLUS 的换代车型，（停产宋 PLUS）属于正常产品切换。」

This also means that the "National SUV," which once set a sales record of 1.57 million units, will gradually fade out in China, and BYD's Ocean Network "marine life + digital" naming system may complete its final puzzle piece. 而这也意味着，曾经创下 157 万辆销售纪录的「国民 SUV」将在国内逐步淡出，比亚迪海洋网「海洋生物+数字」命名体系或将完成最后一块拼图。

The report states that, in fact, the affiliation of Song PLUS has always been a historical issue for BYD. Although Song PLUS carries the "Song" character from the Dynasty series in its name, it was sold under the Ocean Network. 报道称，事实上，宋 PLUS 的归属一直是比亚迪的历史遗留问题，宋 PLUS 虽然带着王朝系列的「宋」字命名，却被放在海洋网销售。

In 2021, to fill the product lineup during the early days of the Ocean Network's establishment, Song PLUS DM-i was incorporated into the Ocean Network. Leveraging the market appeal of the Song family, Song PLUS quickly became the top-selling SUV model within the Ocean Network. 2021 年，为填补海洋网成立初期的产品阵容，宋 PLUS DM-i 被纳入海洋网，凭借宋家族的市场号召力，宋 PLUS 迅速成为海洋网中 SUV 车型销冠。

Driven by Song PLUS, BYD's Ocean Network grew rapidly. As of May this year, the Ocean Network's cumulative sales reached 4.85 million units, with Dolphin's global sales exceeding 850,000 units, and Song PLUS's global sales exceeding 1.57 million units. 在宋 PLUS 带动下，比亚迪海洋网迅速成长。截至今年 5 月，海洋网累计销量已达 485 万辆，其中海豚全球销量超 85 万辆，宋 PLUS 全球销量超 157 万辆。

In July this year, BYD Seal 06 DM-i/EV was officially launched. The new car comes standard with the Eye of God C-Intelligent Driving Assistance Triple-Camera Version (DiPilot100) and the Yunlian-C Intelligent Damping Body Control System. Its price range is 139,800 yuan to 163,800 yuan, highly overlapping with the Song PLUS. 今年 7 月，比亚迪海狮 06 DM-i/EV 正式上市，新车标配天神之眼 C-智能驾驶辅助三目版（DiPilot100），以及标配云辇-C 智能阻尼车身控制系统，售价区间为 13.98 万元至 16.38 万元，与宋 PLUS 高度重叠。

item.title: 保时捷女销冠被 AI 合成不雅视频，本人称已报警
item.guid: 保时捷女销冠被-AI-合成不雅视频，本人称已报警
item.description:
On October 11, the topic 'Porsche female sales champion Ms. Mou declares war on rumor mongers' trended on Weibo. 10 月 11 日，「保时捷女销冠牟女士对造黄谣者宣战」冲上热搜。

According to Jiupai News, Ms. Mou, the protagonist of the incident, stated through reports that she recently discovered someone using AI to synthesize fake and inappropriate videos about her. Many people also 'bombarded' her with calls and WeChat messages, causing her significant distress. 据九派新闻报道，事件主角牟女士通过报道表示，近期发现有人用 AI 合成关于她的虚假视频和不良视频，很多人也电话、微信「轰炸」她，对她造成很大影响。

Ms. Mou emphasized that she has already reported it to the police, saying, 'This incident has affected my work and life, and some people are calling to harass me. Friends, colleagues, and clients are all asking me about it, causing a very serious impact on my reputation. I will not tolerate this this time.' 牟女士强调，自己已经报警，「这次事件对我的工作、生活造成了影响，还有人打电话骚扰我，朋友、同事、客户都在问我，对我名誉造成非常严重的影响，这次绝不姑息。」

On October 10, Ms. Mou posted on social media, officially declaring war on the rumor mongers: 'Thank you to all my fans and friends who have always trusted and supported me. Your voices are my greatest motivation to persevere. I will not be defeated by these dark tricks. Justice may be late, but it will never be absent.' 10 月 10 日，牟女士曾在社交媒体上发文称对造谣者正式宣战，「感谢所有一直信任我、支持我的粉丝和朋友。你们的声音是我坚持下去的最大动力。我不会被这些阴暗的伎俩击垮，正义也许会迟到，但绝不会缺席。」

It's worth noting that on February 4 this year, Ms. Mou also reported a case due to being targeted by malicious rumors. The solemn statement she issued at the time mentioned that someone had stolen and used her photos to post on a certain adult website, with disgusting videos of others (without showing faces) attached below. 需关注的是， 今年 2 月 4 日，牟女士也因被造黄谣而报案。 当时她发布的严正声明提到，有人盗取并占用本人照片发布在某黄色网站，底下还附了他人未露脸的恶心视频。

In response, Zheng Xuan, a lawyer from Beijing Jingdu Law Firm, stated that this behavior may infringe upon Ms. Mou's portrait rights and reputation rights, and the individuals involved may also constitute defamation and the crime of disseminating obscene materials. 对此，北京市京都律师事务所律师郑炫表示，该行为或侵犯牟女士肖像权、名誉权，涉事者可能还构成诽谤罪、传播淫秽物品罪。

He emphasized that the core of AI-generated malicious rumors is the infringer's abuse of technology and trampling on the rights of others, essentially aiming to make victims retreat through psychological manipulation. Whether they are professional women, public figures, or ordinary individuals, everyone has the basic right not to be insulted by false information and does not need to bear moral pressure for the illegal and criminal acts of others. 他强调， AI 造黄谣的核心是侵权者滥用技术、践踏他人权益，其本质是想通过精神控制让受害者退缩。 无论是职场女性、公众人物还是普通个体，都拥有不被虚假信息侮辱的基本权利，无需为他人的违法犯罪行为承担道德压力。

Zheng Xuan stressed that victim women need to clearly recognize that 'being targeted by malicious rumors' is not a personal fault, but proof of having suffered harm; public rights defense is not exposing privacy, but a righteous act of defending dignity. 郑炫强调， 受害女性需清醒认知，「被造黄谣」不是个人过错，而是遭遇侵害的证明；公开维权不是暴露隐私，而是捍卫尊严的正义行为。

As countless cases have proven—silence only makes rumor mongers more arrogant, while actively speaking out allows more people to see the falsity of the rumors, thereby reducing secondary harm to oneself.

Public reports show that Ms. Mou is 34 years old this year and has sold 170 Porsches for two consecutive years in 2023 and 2024, becoming Porsche's annual sales champion twice. In September this year, she once again became Porsche's monthly sales champion, topping the trending searches. 公开报道显示，牟女士今年 34 岁，曾于 2023 年、2024 年连续两年卖出 170 台保时捷，两次成为保时捷年度销冠。今年 9 月，她再度成为保时捷月度销冠，登上热搜第一。

item.title: 宗馥莉辞去娃哈哈董事长等职务
item.guid: 宗馥莉辞去娃哈哈董事长等职务
item.description:
According to reports from Phoenix.com and HUXIU, Zong Fuli resigned from all positions including legal representative, director, and chairperson of Wahaha Group Co., Ltd. (referred to as 'Wahaha Group') on September 12. The resignation process has been approved by the group's shareholders' meeting and board of directors, and Wahaha Group subsequently confirmed the news. 据凤凰网及虎嗅报道， 宗馥莉已于 9 月 12 日向娃哈哈集团有限公司（简称「娃哈哈集团」）辞去公司法定代表人、董事及董事长等全部职务，且辞职程序已通过集团股东会和董事会批准，随后娃哈哈集团也确认该消息属实。

Regarding the reason for Zong Fuli's resignation, Caixin previously reported it was due to 'non-compliant' trademark usage. In response, insiders pointed out that there have indeed been disagreements among shareholders regarding the authorization for using the 'Wahaha' trademark. Insiders further analyzed the reasons: 对于宗馥莉辞职的原因，此前《财新》报道是因为商标使用「不合规」。对此，知情人士指出，股东各方对「娃哈哈」商标的使用授权确实一直存在分歧。知情人士进一步分析了其中的原由：

The ownership of the 'Wahaha' trademark does not belong to the Zong Fuli family but is held by Wahaha Group. Previously, while serving as chairperson and general manager of Wahaha Group, Zong Fuli also operated her family's Hongsheng Beverage Group Co. (referred to as Hongsheng Group). Now, Hongsheng Group, which has no equity relationship with Wahaha Group, wants to independently launch the 'Wa Xiaozong' brand. If Zong Fuli does not resign from her positions at Wahaha Group, it would constitute a conflict of interest due to competition.

It is understood that, according to Article 184 of the 'Company Law,' directors, supervisors, and senior management personnel shall not operate or engage in businesses similar to that of their employing company for themselves or others, unless reported to the board of directors or shareholders' meeting and approved by a resolution of the board of directors or shareholders' meeting in accordance with the company's articles of association. 据悉，根据《公司法》第一百八十四条规定，董事、监事、高级管理人员未向董事会或者股东会报告，并按照公司章程的规定经董事会或者股东会决议通过，不得自营或者为他人经营与其任职公司同类的业务。

HUXIU reported that before Zong Fuli's departure, Hongsheng Group had already initiated relevant investment promotion for its new brand 'Wa Xiaozong.' Sources indicate that the future direction of Hongsheng Group is currently unclear. However, the source believes that Zong Fuli might be able to operate a new brand independently, leveraging Hongsheng Group's strength. 虎嗅方面报道，在宗馥莉下课前，宏胜系已经启动了新品牌「娃小宗」的相关招商。有消息人士表示，目前宏胜系的走向并不明朗。但该人士认为，宗馥莉有可能凭借宏胜系的实力，单独运作新的品牌。

According to Wahaha internal employees, Zong Fuli never sends work messages to frontline employees on weekends or after 10 PM. She has a strong sense of boundaries and gives employees their own space and time. 另据娃哈哈内部员工透露， 宗馥莉从不在周末和晚上十点后给一线员工发工作信息，她有极强的边界感，会给员工留下自己的空间和时间。

According to employees, if Zong Fuli saw employees working overtime around 6 or 7 PM on weekdays, she would usually go over and suggest they go home early to rest. After becoming chairperson, she also increased parental leave for all female employees at Wahaha and refused excessive use of rest days for company team-building activities. 据员工表示，在工作日六七点，宗馥莉如果看到有加班的员工，一般会走过去建议对方早点回家休息。她还在出任董事长后给娃哈哈所有女员工，增加了育儿假；拒绝过度使用休息日安排公司团建等。

Wa Xiaozhi, image from 'Blue Whale News'

It is worth mentioning that, following Zong Fuli's launch of 'Wa Xiaozong,' Zong Fuli's uncle Zong Zehou's brand 'Wa Xiaozhi' also recently started investment promotion activities. 值得一提的是， 继宗馥莉推出「娃小宗」后，宗馥莉叔叔宗泽后的品牌「娃小智」也于近日开启招商活动。

The investment promotion poster shows that on October 10, "Wa Xiaozhi" held a national investment promotion conference in Hangzhou. Purchasing "Wa Xiaozhi" products worth more than 100,000 yuan would grant exclusive dealership qualifications for that region. According to a report by Blue Whale News, relevant investment promotion personnel also confirmed the authenticity of this information. 招商海报显示，10 月 10 日「娃小智」在杭州举行了全国招商会，购买「娃小智」产品 10 万元以上即可获得该区域独家经销商资格。据蓝鲸新闻报道，相关招商人员也向其确认了该信息的真实性。

The investment promotion personnel revealed through the report that the Zong Shifu brand started operating in November last year. "We started working on Wa Xiaozhi around the National Day. This side belongs to the Zong family, specifically Zong Zehou's side, which means we will compete with Zong Fuli in the market. Currently, there is no deposit to become an agent; the first purchase just needs to be no less than 30,000 yuan." 该招商人员通过报道透露，宗师傅品牌从去年 11 月开始运作，「我们从国庆节前后开始做娃小智，这边属于宗氏家族，就是宗泽后这边， 相当于我们要和宗馥莉一起竞争市场。 目前成为代理没有保证金，首次拿货不低于 3 万块钱就可以了。」

In addition, the investment promotion personnel stated that the current product line includes diversified products such as AD calcium milk, mineral water, coconut water, and eight-treasure porridge. "Our formula is exactly the same as Wahaha's, but the price is lower than Wahaha's," the personnel said, adding that "Wa Xiaozhi" has signed 153 clients to date. "Currently, we are mainly working with chain supermarkets and large distribution clients." 此外该招商人员表示，目前整个产品线包含 AD 钙奶、矿泉水、椰子水、八宝粥等多元化产品矩阵，「我们的配方和娃哈哈一模一样，但价格比娃哈哈低，」该招商人员称截至目前，「娃小智」已经签约 153 家客户，「现在基本做的还是连锁超市和大流通的客户。」

item.title: BOSE 停供旧款音箱流媒体服务，引发客户不满
item.guid: BOSE-停供旧款音箱流媒体服务，引发客户不满
item.description:
According to a recent Bloomberg report, BOSE announced this week that it will stop its SoundTouch series speakers' streaming service in February next year, at which point the series products will no longer be able to directly listen to content from streaming platforms such as Spotify, Pandora, and Amazon Music. 据彭博社日前报道，BOSE 本周宣布， 将于明年 2 月停止其 SoundTouch 系列音箱的流媒体服务，届时该系列产品将无法直接从 Spotify、Pandora、Amazon Music 等流媒体平台收听内容。

A BOSE spokesperson stated in the report, "We had to make the difficult decision to discontinue streaming service support for the SoundTouch series, which was launched in 2013." They further explained, "SoundTouch was released ten years ago, and its aging platform, customer expectations, and our own requirements for safety and performance can no longer sustain cloud service support for this series of products." BOSE 发言人通过报道表示，「我们不得不做出艰难的决定——对 2013 年推出的 SoundTouch 系列停止流媒体服务支持。」其进一步解释表示，「SoundTouch 距离现在已发布十年，其老化的平台、客户的期望，以及我们对自己的要求——安全、性能，已无法维持该系列产品继续获取云服务支持。」

BOSE stated that although cloud streaming services will be suspended, users can still use HDMI, Bluetooth, and other methods. BOSE 方面表示，虽然云端流媒体暂停服务，但用户依然能够用 HDMI 接口、蓝牙等方式进行使用。

However, many SoundTouch users have expressed dissatisfaction. According to user Richard Lomas, his 80-year-old uncle and aunt in a nursing home have been using SoundTouch to play their favorite music channels. BOSE's suspension of service will prevent them from easily and habitually listening to content. 但也有不少 SoundTouch 用户表示不满。据用户 Richard Lomas 反馈，自己 80 岁的叔叔、阿姨在养老院一直使用 SoundTouch 来播放他们自己喜欢的音乐频道。而 BOSE 这次暂停服务，会导致他们无法再轻松且习惯性的收听内容。

Richard stated that his elders suffer from Alzheimer's disease, making it difficult for them to use SoundTouch via Bluetooth, AirPlay, and other methods. In response, Richard strongly declared that while he still buys BOSE products, if they decide to take SoundTouch's streaming offline, he will no longer buy any BOSE products. Richard 表示，长辈因患有老年痴呆，因此很难通过蓝牙、AirPlay 等方式进行使用 SoundTouch。对此，Richard 也强烈表示，虽然自己依然有买 BOSE 的产品，但如果决定让 SoundTouch 的流媒体下线，那么自己将不会再买 BOSE 的任何产品。

item.title: 滴滴自动驾驶获 20 亿元融资
item.guid: 滴滴自动驾驶获-20-亿元融资
item.description:
On October 11, Didi Autonomous Driving announced that it had secured Series D funding totaling 2 billion yuan. 10 月 11 日，滴滴自动驾驶宣布获得 D 轮融资，融资总额 20 亿元。

It is reported that the investors include Zhongguancun Science City Technology Growth Fund, Beijing Information Industry Development Investment Fund, Beijing Artificial Intelligence Industry Investment Fund, GAC Group, Guangzhou Guanghua Fund, and Didi. 据悉，本次投资方包括中关村科学城科技成长基金、北京信息产业发展投资基金、北京市人工智能产业投资基金、广汽集团、广州广花基金及滴滴。

The official statement indicates that these funds will be used to increase investment in AI research and development, promote the application of L4 autonomous driving, and contribute to the high-quality development of the transportation industry. 官方表示，该笔资金将用于加大 AI 研发投入、推动 L4 自动驾驶应用落地，助力交通运输行业高质量发展。

Zhang Bo, co-founder of Didi and CEO of Didi Autonomous Driving, stated that L4 autonomous driving technology is one of the most important technological changes in the next decade of the AI era, which will significantly enhance travel safety, efficiency, and experience. 滴滴联合创始人、滴滴自动驾驶 CEO 张博表示，L4 自动驾驶技术是下个十年人工智能时代最重要的技术变革之一，将大幅提升出行安全、效率与体验。

He stated that Didi Autonomous Driving has accumulated nearly ten years of experience in three key areas: AI, mass production, and operations. It will always adhere to responsible technological innovation, steadily promote the development of autonomous driving while actively exploring new employment opportunities, and contribute to the development of the intelligent connected vehicle industry. 其称，滴滴自动驾驶在 AI、量产及运营三个关键领域上已有近十年的积累，将始终坚持负责任的科技创新，在积极探索新型就业空间的同时，稳步推进自动驾驶发展，为智能网联产业发展贡献力量。

item.title: 💡 Perplexity 创始人：不要试图去预测市场或竞争对手的动向
item.guid: 💡-Perplexity-创始人：不要试图去预测市场或竞争对手的动向
item.description:
Recently, Aravind Srinivas, founder and CEO of AI search company Perplexity, elaborated in a deep interview on the core philosophy behind the company's "exponential" growth and painted a future blueprint driven by the AI Agent browser "Comet," which will disrupt existing business and work models. 日前，AI 搜索公司 Perplexity 创始人兼 CEO Aravind Srinivas 在一场深度访谈中，详细阐述了公司实现「指数级」增长背后的核心理念，并描绘了一幅由 AI Agent 浏览器「Comet」驱动的、颠覆现有商业和工作模式的未来蓝图。

During the interview, Aravind extensively showcased the company's revolutionary product—the AI Agent browser Comet. He pointed out that Comet is far more than just a search tool; it is an intelligent partner capable of understanding, thinking, and acting on behalf of the user. 访谈中，Aravind 详细展示了公司的革命性产品——AI Agent 浏览器 Comet。他指出，Comet 远不止是一个搜索工具，它是一个能够理解、思考并代表用户采取行动的智能伙伴。

"In the future, advertisers will no longer directly target you, but will 'bid' to your AI agent," Aravind envisioned. "Your AI assistant will filter out all the noise for you and can even negotiate with apps like Uber and Lyft to get you the best prices. 「在未来，广告商将不再直接面向你，而是向你的 AI 代理『竞标』，」 Aravind 构想道。「你的 AI 助手会为你过滤掉所有噪音，甚至可以与 Uber、Lyft 等应用协商，为你争取最优价格。

Aravind also mentioned, "More importantly, we envision a new business model where platforms can return a portion of the 'referral fees' received from service providers back to users. This is the first time AI is truly in the hands of users, allowing a portion of advertising profits to flow back to the value-creating consumers." Aravind 还提到，「更重要的是，我们设想了一种全新的商业模式，平台可以将一部分从服务商那里获得的『引流费用』返还给用户。这是第一次，AI 真正掌握在用户手中，让广告利润的一部分回流到创造价值的消费者手里。」

When asked for advice for AI entrepreneurs, Aravind emphasized that in the face of fierce competition from giants like Google and OpenAI, the only way to win is through "obsession." 当被问及对 AI 领域创业者的建议时，Aravind 强调，面对 Google、OpenAI 等巨头的激烈竞争，唯一的取胜之道在于「痴迷」。

Don't try to predict the market or the moves of competitors.

He suggested, "The only thing you can bet on is what you are truly obsessed with and willing to fight for until the end. Because only you care more about the problem you are solving than anyone else in the world. First, build a product you love, and then you might discover that it's exactly what the whole world needs." 他建议， 「唯一能下注的，就是你自己真正痴迷并愿意为之奋斗到底的东西。因为只有你，比世界上任何人都更关心你要解决的问题。先为自己打造一个热爱的产品，你才有可能发现，这恰好也是全世界都需要的。」

item.title: 焕新极氪 001 发布，官方：明年无换代计划
item.guid: 焕新极氪-001-发布，官方：明年无换代计划
item.description:
Last night, Zeekr officially released the refreshed Zeekr 001. First, let's look at the price: 昨晚，极氪正式发布了焕新版极氪 001，先看售价：

There are two battery versions: 95 kWh and 103 kWh. The 95 kWh version is only available as the Max trim, priced at 259,800 yuan. The 103 kWh version offers rear-wheel drive and all-wheel drive, with prices ranging from 259,800 to 319,800 yuan.

The refreshed Zeekr 001 adds several standard features across all trims: 焕新款极氪 001 新增多项全系标配：

    The 900V high-voltage platform brings a charging speed of 7 minutes (10%-80%) and a 0-100 km/h acceleration time of 2.83 seconds;

    NVIDIA Thor-U chip and lidar, making advanced assisted driving no longer exclusive to the top trim;

    Naim audio system, front and rear seat ventilation, heating, and massage, as well as the massive 39.3-inch AR-HUD.

The high-voltage platform equipped in the new car brings higher efficiency. Official data shows that the rear-wheel drive model with a 103 kWh battery has a CLTC range of up to 810 kilometers, with energy consumption as low as 13.6 kWh per 100 kilometers, and a tested range achievement rate of over 90%. 新车所搭载的高电压平台带来了更高的效率。官方数据显示，搭载 103 度电池的后驱车型 CLTC 续航里程最高可达 810 公里，其百公里能耗低至 13.6 千瓦时，续航达成率实测在 90% 以上。

Additionally, the Ultra model comes standard with dual-chamber air suspension and a CCD electromagnetic damping system. This combination gives the vehicle's chassis a wide range of adjustability, with the air suspension offering a height adjustment travel of 85 millimeters and a maximum ground clearance of 206 millimeters. 另外，Ultra 车型标配双腔空气悬架和 CCD 电磁减振系统。这套组合让车辆的底盘具备了极大的调节范围，空气悬架的高度调节行程达到 85 毫米，最高离地间隙可达 206 毫米。

In terms of intelligence, the refreshed 001 comes standard with the "Qianli Haohan H7" assisted driving system across all trims. On the software level, this system adopts a "cloud + vehicle-side" VLA large model architecture, enabling it to handle complex scenarios. 智能化方面，焕新 001 全系标配「千里浩瀚 H7」辅助驾驶系统。在软件层面，这套系统采用了「云端+车端」VLA 大模型架构，使其具备了处理复杂场景的能力。

Reflecting on specific functions, in addition to mainstream urban and highway navigation assistance features, it also achieves universal obstacle emergency avoidance at 130 km/h and active safety functions such as tire blowout stability control at 120 km/h. 反映到具体功能上，除了主流的城市与高速领航辅助功能，它还实现了时速 130km/h 下的通用障碍物紧急避让，以及时速 120km/h 下的爆胎稳定控制等主动安全功能。

It is worth mentioning that Zeekr also made a commitment this time: "There are no plans for a 001 model generation change in 2026. Normal OTA software upgrades or optional configuration changes will be launched based on user needs and market competition." 值得一提的是，极氪这次还给出了一个承诺： 「001 车型 2026 年无换代计划，车辆正常的 OTA 软件升级或选装配置变化，会根据用户需求和市场竞争需求推出」 。

item.title: 努比亚 Z80 Ultra 外观公布
item.guid: 努比亚-Z80-Ultra-外观公布
item.description:
Yesterday, Nubia officially unveiled the exterior information of its new Z80 Ultra phone. 昨日，努比亚正式公布了其 Z80 Ultra 新机的外观信息。

According to the released information, the new phone offers three color options: Phantom Black, Condensing White, and Starry Sky Collector's Edition. The overall design continues the previous generation's style, featuring a rectangular, through-type rear camera module. It's worth noting that while the Nubia Z80 Ultra has a generally square body, it incorporates many rounded treatments (such as the camera module, back cover, and aluminum alloy frame). 从公布的内容来看，新机提供魅影黑、凝光白、星空典藏版三款配色，整体设计延续前代风格，采用长方形贯穿式后摄模组。值得关注的是，努比亚 Z80 Ultra 虽然整机方正，但加入了很多圆弧化处理（如相机模组、后盖、铝合金中框）。

Regarding the rear cameras, the new phone still features a 35mm focal length main camera and offers a periscope telephoto lens. Additionally, the new phone will be equipped with the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition processor. The front continues to use a full screen without a punch-hole, and under-display camera technology is expected. 后置镜头方面，新机依然配备 35mm 焦段主摄镜头，提供潜望式长焦。另外，新机将搭载第五代骁龙 8 至尊版处理器。正面则继续使用无挖孔全面屏，预计提供屏下摄像头技术。

The new phone will be officially released on October 22nd. 新机将于 10 月 22 日正式发布。

item.title: 索尼首款 G 大师微距镜头发布
item.guid: 索尼首款-G-大师微距镜头发布
item.description:
On October 11th, Sony (China) Co., Ltd. officially released its first G Master series macro lens, the FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS (model name: SEL100M28GM). 10 月 11 日，索尼（中国）有限公司正式发布首款 G 大师系列微距镜头 FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS（型号名：SEL100M28GM）。

It is worth mentioning that this year marks the 15th anniversary of Sony Alpha™ mirrorless cameras. As the 81st E-mount lens, this new product achieves groundbreaking technological innovation: 值得一提的是，今年是索尼微单™诞生 15 周年，作为第 81 支 E 卡口镜头，新品实现了突破性技术创新：

    Offers the highest magnification ratio of approximately 1.4x among Sony's original lenses to date, and can be extended to approximately 2.8x with a teleconverter;

    Equipped with four high-thrust XD linear motors, improving autofocus (AF) performance by approximately 1.9 times compared to the previous generation macro lens (compared to the FE 90mm F2.8 MACRO G OSS lens);

    First to feature an optical image stabilization system designed specifically for macro photography, capable of precisely compensating for angular (pitch/yaw), shift (up/down/left/right), and depth (front/back) direction shake.

In terms of optical design, the FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS uses an 11-blade circular aperture, equipped with two XA (extreme aspherical) elements and two ED (extra-low dispersion) elements, maintaining high-resolution image quality from the center to the edges of the frame, and effectively suppressing chromatic aberration and other undesirable aberrations. The new product also features Sony's unique second-generation Nano AR Coating technology. 光学设计上，FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS 采用 11 片圆形光圈，搭载了两枚 XA（超级非球面）镜片和两枚 ED（低色散）镜片，画面中心到边缘均保持了高分辨率的画质表现，并能有效抑制色散与其他不良像差。新品还采用索尼独特的第二代纳米 AR 镀膜技术。

Regarding sales, the Sony FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS G Master lens will be available in late October 2025, with a suggested retail price of 9299 yuan. 销售情况方面，索尼 FE 100mm F2.8 Macro GM OSS G 大师镜头将在 2025 年 10 月下旬上市，建议零售价为 9299 元。

item.title: 红魔全球首发手机水冷技术
item.guid: 红魔全球首发手机水冷技术
item.description:
On October 11, the RedMagic Liquid Cooling and Gaming Technology Launch Event was officially held, showcasing RedMagic's latest breakthroughs in mobile phone cooling technology. 10 月 11 日，红魔水冷暨游戏技术发布会正式举办，并展示了红魔在手机散热技术领域的最新突破。

RedMagic stated that they drew inspiration from high-precision equipment such as F1 racing cars, tunnel boring machines, and supercomputing servers, and for the first time adopted the same coolant used in AI servers—fluorinated liquid—as a heat dissipation material, bringing liquid cooling technology into the mobile phone industry. 红魔表示，他们从 F1 赛车、盾构机、超算服务器等高精尖设备中吸取灵感，首次采用 AI 服务器的同款冷却液——氟化液作为散热材料，将水冷科技带入手机行业。

After multiple rounds of liquid flow channel structure design iterations and using micron-level laser cutting processing technology, RedMagic successfully placed ultra-fine liquid flow channels as thin as 0.03mm inside the phone body. To ensure the drop resistance of the liquid cooling system and prevent coolant leakage, RedMagic also pioneered an ultra-low temperature bonding process, using exclusive polymer cushioning materials. 历经多轮液体流道结构设计迭代，并采用微米级激光切割加工工艺，红魔成功在手机机身内放入薄至 0.03mm 的超精细液体流道。为了保证水冷散热系统的抗跌落能力，防止水冷液泄漏，红魔还行业首创了超低温键合工艺，采用独家高分子缓冲材料。

At the same time, to ensure efficient liquid circulation within the flow channels, RedMagic also embedded an ultra-low voltage conversion driver IC in the micro-pump, capable of converting voltage from 3V to 150V, ensuring an ultra-high output pressure of 100kPa, allowing the micro-pump to efficiently drive liquid flow within the pipes and improve phone cooling efficiency. 同时为保证流道内液态的高效流通，红魔还在微泵内植入了一颗超低压转化驱动 IC，能够将电压从 3V 转化到 150V，保证了 100kPa 的超高输出压力，让微泵能够高效驱动管道内液体流动，提升手机散热效率。

In addition, the new YuFeng 4.0 has been upgraded to 24,000 revolutions per minute, and the fan air duct module has been independently designed, using new nano-level airtight materials to achieve IPX8 waterproofing. This time, RedMagic also introduced a new cooling system—air-cooled dual-track cooling, which improves cooling efficiency by 120% compared to single-track cooling. 另外，全新的驭风 4.0 升级到了每分钟 24000 转，还将风扇风道模块独立设计，并使用全新的纳米级气密性材料，实现了 IPX8 的防水。并且此次红魔还带来了全新的散热系统——风冷双轨散热，相比单轨散热效率提升了 120%。

To achieve the strongest tuning for the fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Ultimate Edition, RedMagic applied both the active cooling fan YuFeng 4.0 and the pulsating liquid cooling engine to the RedMagic 11 Pro series through the ICE Magic Cooling system. The new phone will be officially released on October 17. 为了实现第五代骁龙 8 至尊版的最强调校，红魔通过 ICE 魔冷散热系统，将主动散热风扇驭风 4.0 和脉动水冷引擎同时应用到红魔 11 Pro 系列上。新机将于 10 月 17 日正式发布。

item.title: 特斯拉车机更新《创·战神》主题，被吐槽植入广告
item.guid: 特斯拉车机更新《创·战神》主题，被吐槽植入广告
item.description:
According to electrek, Tesla recently partnered with Disney to promote content related to Disney's new movie "Tron: Ares" on its in-car system, but this move has sparked dissatisfaction among car owners, who believe Tesla is placing advertisements inside the car. 据 electrek 报道，特斯拉近期与迪士尼合作，在前者的车机上推广迪士尼新电影《创·战神》相关内容，但这一举动引发车主不满，认为特斯拉在车内投放广告。

From the official demo video, it appears that Tesla vehicles updated with this version will receive a "Tron: Ares" theme, and the SR vehicle model in the car's system will transform into the futuristic motorcycle design from the movie. 从官方公布的演示片来看，更新了该版本的特斯拉车机将获得一套《创·战神》的主题，车机中的 SR 车辆模型将会变为电影中的未来摩托车造型。

It's worth noting that Tesla CEO Elon Musk has publicly stated his dislike for Disney, and has even removed Disney+ from Tesla's in-car system. This update has also been criticized by car owners as "worthless" and "ads in the car". 值得一提的是，特斯拉 CEO 马斯克曾公开表示并不喜欢迪士尼，甚至已经将 Disney+ 从特斯拉车机中移除。而本次更新也遭到车主吐槽「毫无价值」「广告进车」。

The report points out that car owners' dissatisfaction stems more from the "uselessness" of Tesla's updated content—the long-promised full self-driving capability has yet to be implemented, and older HW3 models haven't even received updates for over a year. 报道指出，车主的不满更多来自于特斯拉更新内容的「无用」——承诺许久的全自动驾驶能力迟迟未上车，老旧的 HW3 车型甚至一年多没有更新过。

item.title: 网易云音乐回应「已故歌手李玟账号被异常登录」
item.guid: 网易云音乐回应「已故歌手李玟账号被异常登录」
item.description:
Recently, a netizen posted that when registering for NetEase Cloud Music with a newly acquired phone number, they automatically logged into singer Coco Lee's account after receiving a verification code. 日前，有网友发帖称，自己在使用新办的手机号注册网易云音乐时，收到验证码后自动登录上了歌手李玟的账号。

After logging in, the netizen could also see nostalgic private messages from fans in the account's backend. The logged-in interface showed: account name "Coco Lee", with 261,000 followers and 2 badges. The inbox contained a large number of unread fan private messages, mostly recent (September-October 2025) memorial messages, such as "Always love you" and "Coco, please come back". 登录后，该网友还能在账号后台看到粉丝们发来的怀念私信。登录后界面显示：账号名为「李玟」，拥有 26.1 万粉丝、2 枚徽章。收件箱内有大量未读粉丝私信，内容多为近期（2025 年 9 月-10 月）的悼念留言，如「永远爱你」「Coco，回来好不好」等。

Regarding this matter, NetEase Cloud Music customer service stated when contacted by Jiemian News that, after verification, the problem was caused by the phone number bound to the artist's account being re-released by the operator. They have contacted the new number owner immediately for appropriate handling. 针对此事，网易云音乐客服在接受界面新闻咨询时表示，经核查， 问题原因是团队为艺人账号绑定的手机号被运营商二次放号所致。已第一时间联系新号主进行了相应的处理。

Some analysts believe that while the Coco Lee account login incident is an isolated case, it also reflects the universal issues of account security and digital legacy management in the digital age. Platforms should strengthen account security mechanisms, enhance technical protection and emergency response, and users should raise their security awareness. Only then can memories and respect in virtual spaces be properly protected. 有分析认为，李玟账号被登录事件虽然是个案，但也折射出数字时代账号安全与数字遗产管理的普遍问题。平台方应加强账号安全机制，强化技术防护与应急响应，用户应该提高安全意识等。唯有如此，才能让虚拟空间中的记忆与尊重得到妥善守护。

item.title: 《王者荣耀》十周年三星堆限定皮肤公布
item.guid: 《王者荣耀》十周年三星堆限定皮肤公布
item.description:
Yesterday, "Honor of Kings" announced its tenth anniversary collaboration with the Sanxingdui Museum, simultaneously revealing its tenth-anniversary limited Sanxingdui-themed skin series. 昨日，《王者荣耀》宣布其十周年将与三星堆博物馆进行合作，并同步曝光了其十周年限定三星堆主题系列皮肤。

Specifically, the four limited skins deeply integrate elements of ancient Shu civilization: "Nuwa: Genesis of All Spirits" (available for exchange on October 15), "Hou Yi: Divine Tree Reaching Heaven" (free exchange upon login on October 25), "Yang Jian: Shifting Mountains with Vertical Eyes" (limited-time availability from October 25 to 31), and "Shao Si Yuan: Witchcraft Ritual to the Gods" (limited-time flash sale from October 25 to 31). 具体来看，四款限定皮肤深度融合古蜀文明元素，分别为「女娲·万灵启世」（10 月 15 日开启兑换）「后羿·神树通天」（10 月 25 日登录免费兑换）「杨戬·纵目迁山」（10 月 25 日至 31 日限时上架）「少司缘·巫礼祀神」（10 月 25 日至 31 日限时秒杀）。

It's worth mentioning that the official announcement also stated that Zhang Yimou served as the art director for this collaboration. 值得一提的是，官方还表示本次还联动了张艺谋担任艺术指导。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》发布「夏奇羊」新歌《Zoo》
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》发布「夏奇羊」新歌《Zoo》
item.description:
Recently, "Zootopia 2" released a new song "Zoo" by Zootopia diva "Gazelle" (Shakira). 日前，《疯狂动物城 2》发布 Zootopia 天后「夏奇羊」的新歌《Zoo》。

It is reported that "Zoo" will feature the return of "Gazelle" voice actress Shakira for the singing, with Ed Sheeran participating in the songwriting. 据悉，《Zoo》将由「夏奇羊」配音演员夏奇拉回归演唱，并有黄老板 Ed Sheeran 参与词曲创作。

"Zootopia 2" will be released simultaneously in mainland China and North America on November 26, 2025, directed by returning co-directors Byron Howard and Jared Bush from the previous film. Disney revealed this. 《疯狂动物城 2》将于 2025 年 11 月 26 日中国内地、北美同步上映，由上一部的联合导演拜伦·霍华德、杰拉德·布什回归执导。迪士尼方面透露。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜「王老吉」海外商标之争
item.guid: One-Fun-Thing｜「王老吉」海外商标之争
item.description:
On September 30, Guangzhou Wanglaoji Great Health Industry Co., Ltd. (Wanglaoji Great Health Company, Wanglaoji Walovi) issued a statement saying: 9 月 30 日，广州王老吉大健康产业有限公司（王老吉大健康公司、王老吉 Walovi）发文表示：

JDB Group issued a statement regarding overseas trademark disputes, stating that information concerning "Wanglaoji" brand trademark cases in "Canada and the EU" and other overseas regions seriously deviates from the facts and deliberately misleads public perception.

At the same time, Wanglaoji Great Health Company also stated that JDB has maliciously registered trademarks in over 60 countries and regions worldwide through overseas offshore affiliated companies, interfering with its normal expansion of overseas business, "causing serious obstacles to the internationalization of national brands and constituting unfair competition." 同时，王老吉大健康公司方面还表示加多宝通过海外离岸关联公司在全球 60 余个国家和地区进行恶意注册，干扰其正常拓展海外业务，「对民族品牌出海造成严重阻碍，属不正当竞争行为」。

On October 10, JDB issued a statement on the ownership of the overseas "Wanglaoji" trademark: 10 月 10 日，加多宝方面发布海外「王老吉」商标所有权声明：

Since the 1990s, JDB Group obtained the ancestral herbal tea recipe and the right to use the overseas Wanglaoji trademark from the descendants of Wang Laoji (whose real name was Wang Zebang), and legally acquired ownership of the overseas Wanglaoji trademark in the early 2000s.

JDB Group has a leading vision, having pioneered the first canned red herbal tea and the first canned authentic Wanglaoji herbal tea in the 1990s. To make more consumers aware of China's herbal tea category, JDB Group actively explored overseas markets, registering the Wanglaoji trademark in over 60 major countries and regions worldwide to consolidate its market position and brand image.

JDB also stated that it will continue to firmly and actively promote brand rights protection and assurance work, legally defending the intellectual property rights of the overseas Wanglaoji brand owned by the group. 加多宝还表示，将继续坚定积极推进品牌维权和保证工作，依法捍卫集团拥有的海外王老吉品牌的知识产权。

Subsequently, Wanglaoji Great Health Company once again issued the "Solemn Statement on Overseas Trademark Cases of 'Wanglaoji' (II)", directly stating, "If you are sick, go to the hospital; if you have a problem, go to court. Thank you!" 随后，王老吉大健康公司再次发布《关于「王老吉」境外商标案件的严正声明（二）》，直接表示「有病去医院，有事找法院。谢谢！」

item.title: 周末看什么｜《我的天才女友 第一季》
item.guid: 周末看什么｜《我的天才女友-第一季》
item.description:
"My Brilliant Friend Season 1" currently has a Douban rating of 9.4, ranking fifth on the "Douban High-Scoring Classic European Drama List". 《我的天才女友 第一季》目前豆瓣评分 9.4，获得「豆瓣高分经典欧洲剧榜」第五名。

The series is adapted from the first book of author Elena Ferrante's "Neapolitan Novels" quartet, telling the story of the teenage years of the two heroines, Lila and Elena — growing up together in a dilapidated neighborhood in Naples, inseparable from childhood, trusting each other, yet both seeing the other as a secret mirror and subtly competing. 该剧改编自作家埃莱娜·费兰特的小说「那不勒斯四部曲」第一部，讲述了两个女主人公莉拉和埃莱娜的少女时代 —— 两人一起成长于那不勒斯一个破败的社区，从小形影不离，彼此信赖，但又都视对方为自己隐秘的镜子，暗暗角力。

The series premiered in 2018, consisting of eight episodes, directed by Saverio Costanzo, and starring Elisa Del Genio, Ludovica Nasti, Margherita Mazzucco, and others. 剧集于 2018 年首播，共八集，由萨维里奥·科斯坦佐执导，伊利莎·德尔·吉尼欧、卢多维卡·纳斯提、玛格丽塔·马祖可等主演。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《撒旦探戈》
item.guid: 买书不读指南｜《撒旦探戈》
item.description:
"Satantango" currently has a Douban rating of 8.8, and is the debut and representative novel written by Hungarian author László Krasznahorkai in 1985. 《撒旦探戈》目前豆瓣评分 8.8，是匈牙利作家克拉斯诺霍尔卡伊·拉斯洛（Krasznahorkai László）于 1985 年创作的处女作与代表长篇小说。

It is worth mentioning that László Krasznahorkai is a recipient of the International Booker Prize, the Kossuth Prize, and the 2025 Nobel Prize in Literature. He has visited China multiple times and authored works with Chinese themes. 值得一提的是，克拉斯诺霍尔卡伊·拉斯洛是布克国际文学奖、科苏特奖得主及2025年诺贝尔文学奖获得者，曾多次访华并著有中国主题作品。

Set in a post-socialist Hungarian village, the work depicts the survival struggles of villagers in a dilapidated village under continuous rain, revealing the alienation of human nature through acts such as alcoholism, adultery, and voyeurism. 作品以后社会主义时代的匈牙利乡村为背景，描绘破败村庄中村民在连绵阴雨下的生存困境，通过酗酒、通奸、偷窥等行为展现人性异化。

The entire book adopts a tango-like mirrored structure, with six chapters in chronological order echoing six chapters in reverse, and the voyeuristic records from a doctor's perspective combined with fragmented narration forming a circular labyrinth. 全书采用探戈舞步式镜像结构，六章正序与六章倒叙呼应，医生视角的偷窥记录与碎片化叙事形成环形迷宫。

Additionally, Yu Zemin's Chinese translation is considered a translation miracle due to the structural differences between European languages and Chinese, and it won the National Book Award for Translated Literature in the United States. The entire novel features viscous, winding sentences without paragraph breaks. 另外，余泽民翻译的中译本因欧洲语言与汉语构造差异被视为翻译奇迹并获得美国全国图书奖翻译文学奖，整部小说句子黏稠、缠绕、不分段落。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《小小梦魇 3》
item.guid: 游戏推荐｜《小小梦魇-3》
item.description:
"Little Nightmares 3", which just launched on October 10, currently has mixed reviews on Steam (with a total of 1800+ comments). 10 月 10 日刚上线的《小小梦魇 3》，目前 Steam 评分处于褒贬不一的状态（共计 1800+ 条评论）。

It is reported that "Little Nightmares 3" is a horror adventure game planned by Bandai Namco and developed by Supermassive Games, serving as the third sequel in the series. The game was originally scheduled for release in 2024 but was later postponed to October 10, 2025, for Switch series, PS4/PS5, Xbox, and PC platforms, and introduces online co-op play for the first time. 据悉，《小小梦魇 3》是由万代南梦宫筹划、Supermassive Games 开发的恐怖冒险游戏，为该系列第三部续作。游戏原定 2024 年发售，后宣布延期至 2025 年 10 月 10 日登陆 Switch 系列、PS4/PS5、Xbox 及 PC 等平台，并首次引入支持在线合作游玩机制。

Players will control Little Low with a bow and arrow and Little Alone with a wrench, cooperating to solve puzzles and survive in scenes like the Sand Tomb City and Candy Factory in the Spiral World. The game continues the series' dark fairy tale style of two-player cooperative gameplay, supporting breakthroughs of traps and mechanisms with an AI partner or real players online. 玩家将操控拥有弓箭的小洛与持扳手的小寂，在螺旋世界的沙地墓城、糖果工厂等场景中合作解谜求生。该作延续系列黑暗童话风格的双人协作玩法，支持与 AI 搭档或真人联机突破机关陷阱。

Currently, "Little Nightmares 3" is priced starting from 178 yuan on Steam. 目前《小小梦魇 3》Steam 售价为 178 元起。
